creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Cloth band, Newly lined. Overall cross stitch embroidery in silk thread on red cotton fabric. The four \'horn\' motifs are embroidered in herringbone stitch over the cross stitch. There is a striped cotton twill backing.
medium: Silk, cotton, linen; cross-stitch, double chain stitch
title: Ilgich
